original_title: Il museo chiude quando l'autore Ã¨ stanco
overview: A documentary about Fausto Delle Chiaie, an italian artist. He worked in many european countries and spent the last 30 years exhibiting on the streets of Rome creating his own 'Open Air Museum' made of artworks, living sculptures, performances and... a lot of irony.
title: The museum closes when the author is tired
